description:
The Ads product area within Google is one of the only groups that has the opportunity of looking across and working with many of Google’s core products. This team focuses on making meaningful, useful and beautiful commercial products within Search, Maps, Assistant, Voice and New Markets. Within our User Experience (UX) organization the Google Ads team has become recognized for the innovation it propels. It’s growing, and given the continued importance of the commercialization of our products and the subtleties, nuances, and complexities of our product suite.

As a UX Director, you will help define and drive the future of Google design, by identifying and setting product strategy, and inspiring teams to push the boundaries of what’s possible. You will apply your passion for research and design processes, rapid and iterative product development, and deep collaboration skills to design and deliver compelling experiences for our users across many Google products. You'll drive product vision, execution excellence, and cross-functional relationships to enhance design’s strategic value within the organization.

User experience (UX) is at the forefront of how we create intuitive, innovative, and beautiful products that people love. We strive to learn and understand our users’ needs, behaviors, and emotions to yield insights that inform product strategy and guide the design of the experiences we create. Our multidisciplinary UX teams include designers, researchers, content strategists, and engineers who are passionate about quality, usability, and performance. We collaborate closely with product managers, software engineers, and many others to solve complex challenges and craft powerful experiences that highlight our products’ unique capabilities and personalities. Our work touches billions while exemplifying a key principle that is core to Google’s philosophy: “Focus on the user and all else will follow.”

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Design, HCI, Interaction, or equivalent practical experience.
  • 15 years of experience in creating strategy and designing products.
  • 15 years experience in working with front end mobile and web technologies.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Track record of key contributions to innovative, successful products and UI Platforms.
  • Excellent communication skills with the ability to listen, articulate positions, and advocate designs.
  • UX portfolio demonstrating clear insights, problem-solving, and simple solutions.
responsibilities:
• Create compelling product visions and strategic roadmaps that lead to the growth of existing products as well as pursuing new ones and nurture and grow a Design and Research team.
  • Identify opportunities for innovation, insight, and improvement, advocate for the efforts of your team and collaborate across Google to make all products better.
  • Build relationships and operating rhythms with leaders inside and outside of Google Ads to drive user experiences that are cohesive, inclusive, and well-informed.
  • Collaborate with the Product Management and Engineering Directors both within Google Ads and across Google to optimize experience.
  • Learn the subtleties and nuances of the Google Ads product suite and foster Google’s culture and principles within the group, while setting new standards in execution excellence.
title: Director UX, Ads
